description.value:
Once you reach 4th level, the protection your Rage provides you expands to allow you to face even more powerful threats. While raging, you gain additional resistances to various damage types. You choose one grouping from below when you first gain this feature. You can select an additional grouping at 10th level, and again at 15th level.

Oppose Annihilation. You have Resistance to Acid, Lightning, and Radiant damage.

Stand Against Destruction. You have Resistance to Fire, Necrotic, and Thunder damage.

Withstand Ruination. You have Resistance to Cold, Force, and Poison damage.
